instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard and trackpad only work when boot
threads.message:
Hi guys,

Got this macbook air with very strange problem.


Trackpad and keyboard only working if you but with OPTION. While you are on boot device selection all is working fine. Once you select what u want boot it stops working.

First i tought it was software issue. But bootin from usb, from other hard drive got exactly same problem.

Anyone faced that kind of issue?



P.S.solved. it was trackpad. Still cant understan how it works in boot menu and not working in OS.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard and trackpad only work when boot
threads.message:
Before loading OSX drivers, trackpad/keyboard work on USB mode.
Once entered into OSX, SPI mode is activated.
In case if file vault is activated, trackpad/keyboard still work on welcome/password screen...

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> keyboard and trackpad only work when boot
threads.message: is there any way to make it work on USB mode when OSX is loaded?
